title: Resource
description: Immutable set of attributes identifying the entity (service, host, process) that produces telemetry. Resource attributes are merged into all signals (traces, metrics, logs) emitted by a process at the SDK level, making accurate resource definition critical for cross-signal correlation.

serviceName.description: OTel Resource semantic convention: logical name of the service (service.name)

serviceVersion.description: OTel Resource semantic convention: version of the service (service.version)

deploymentEnvironment.description: OTel Resource semantic convention: deployment environment (deployment.environment)

attributes.description: Key-value pairs of observability metadata attached to this signal, per the OpenTelemetry attribute specification. Keys are strings; values may be strings, booleans, integers, floats, or arrays thereof.
